work_experience.title: iOS Developer
work_experience.company: 乐视网信息技术(北京)有限公司
work_experience.description:
Team: 移动技术产品组

项目: [乐视视频客户端(iPhone/iPad)](https://itunes.apple.com/cn/app/le-shi-shi-pin-dian-ying-dian/id385285922?mt=8)

* 做为核心成员，参与乐视视频iOS客户端播放器重构工作。使用`消息总线`、`命令模式`、`状态机`、`插件`等设计模式，使播放器支持复杂的功能需求。效果：减少50%代码行数，解决了若干之前无法解决的顽固bug，提高了代码的逻辑性和可读性，大幅降低了各模块之间的耦合度。
* 创建`三播放器方案`。该方案可以动态的、顺滑的在任意时间播放广告，在播放过程中也可以动态地获取广告数据并在相应时间播放。可以实现广告预加载、网络不好时自动跳过广告。使用这个方案提高了乐视视频app 10%广告投放效率。

Team: 公共组件项目组

Project: 乐视登录SDK

* 主导开发注册/登录组件。根据文档或通过CocoaPods，简单几步就可以集成。已经在集团十几个产品线上稳定使用。

Team: 乐视体育－移动端研发部

Project: [乐视体育客户端(iPhone/iPad)](https://itunes.apple.com/cn/app/le-shi-ti-yu-zhong-chao-du/id983202217?mt=8)

* 主要工作是播放器内核开发（基于AVPlayer），以及可重用组件开发，如_表情键盘_，_弹幕系统_。

work_experience.title: iOS Developer
work_experience.description:
Team: Mobile Technology and Products

Project: [LeTV iPhone/iPad Client](https://itunes.apple.com/cn/app/le-shi-shi-pin-dian-ying-dian/id385285922?mt=8)

* Refactored the core player of LeTV iOS Client, using design patterns of `message bus`, `command`, `state machine`, `plugin` to make the player support the complex functional requirement. Impact: Reduced 50% lines of code and improved the logicality. Widely reduced the coupling degree of different modules (such as player module and advertisement module).
* Create `Triple Player Solution` to play advertisement fluently and dynamically. It can preload AD data. When network slowdown, it can skip AD automatically. It has the ability to insert ADs at anytime (even when video is playing). This feature boosted 10% effective rate of AD.

Team: Public Reusable Component Team

Project: LeTV Login SDK

* Built a consistent register and login component for many different applications. It is easy to integrate with several steps by following the document or through CocoaPods.

Team: LeSports Mobile Development Team

Project: [LeSports iPhone/iPad Client](https://itunes.apple.com/cn/app/le-shi-ti-yu-zhong-chao-du/id983202217?mt=8)

* Focused on the architecture of core player (based on AVPlayer) and reuseable component, such as _emotion keyboard_, _danmaku system_ of this __#1 Sports App__ in China.
